message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $9,500 is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay. I'm prepared to offer $8,500.  Let me know if that works for you.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't let it go for less than $9,000. This product is of exceptional quality and will bring you a lot of value.

Alice, I understand the product's value, but $9,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $8,750.  It's a fair price considering my budget and the value I'm getting. Let me know what you think.
